name: 林皓輿
objective:
本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, as well as practice sessions for delivering prepared speeches and impromptu speeches.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Conversation 1 (Topic: World News - Europe)
Week 3: Conversation 2 (Topic: Work Environment)
Week 4: Conversation 3 (Topic: small talk with strangers)
Week 5: Role Play (Short play)
Week 6: Conversation 4 (Topic: World News - North and South America)
Week 7: Conversation 5 (Topic: Taboo)
Week 8: Conversation 6 (Topic: Debate)
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Conversation 7 (Topic: World News - Asia)
Week 11: Conversation 8 (Topic: Speech)
Week 12: Conversation 9 (Topic: Impromptu Speech)
Week 13: Role Play 2 (Short play)
Week 14: Conversation 10 (Topic: World News - Africa)
Week 15: Conversation 11 (Topic: Current trends)
Week 16: Conversation 12 (Topic: Current Trends - free of choice)
Week 17: Role Play 3 (Short play)
Week 18: Final Eaxm
scorePolicy:
Weekly Assignments/ Test 20%
Midterm 20%
Final 20%
Personal Presentation 10%
Group Presentation 10%
English Project 20%

Extra credit may be apply, and evaluation and grading policy may be changed pending on the first week.
